import React from 'react' const AllUsers = () => { return null } const UserProfile = () => { const [author, setAuthor] = useState(null) let { id } = useParams() // get the id from url return ( author && (
{author.name} {author.email} {author.company.name} {author.phone} {author.address.street} - {author.address.city} - {author.address.zipcode}
) ) } export default AllUsers
